English: Use the <color=orange>PING</color> command on a terminal in [KEYCARD_ZONE] to find [KEYCARD_NAME]

Italian.Translation: Usare il comando <color=orange>PING</color> su un terminale in [KEYCARD_ZONE] per trovare [KEYCARD_NAME]

German.Translation: Nutzen Sie den Befehl <color=orange>PING</color> an einem Terminal in [KEYCARD_ZONE], um [KEYCARD_NAME] zu finden.

Spanish.Translation: Usa el comando <color=orange>PING</color> en una terminal en [KEYCARD_ZONE] para encontrar [KEYCARD_NAME].

Russian.Translation: Используйте команду <color=orange>PING</color> на терминале в [KEYCARD_ZONE] и найдите: [KEYCARD_NAME].

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Use o comando <color=orange>PING</color> em um terminal em [KEYCARD_ZONE] para encontrar [KEYCARD_NAME]

Polish.Translation: Użyj polecenia <color=orange>PING</color> w terminalu w [KEYCARD_ZONE], aby znaleźć [KEYCARD_NAME].
